summary: TAKATA RECALL  I BELIEVE TOYOTA HAS TAKEN AN UNREASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME TO RESOLVE THE TAKATA INFLATOR ISSUE. THE INTERIM NOTICE FOR THE RECALL IS DATED MAY 23, 2016 ON TOYOTA'S WEBSITE. I DID NOT RECEIVE ANY DIRECT (MAIL) CORRESPONDENCE UNTIL DECEMBER 2016, IN WHICH THE LETTER SAID TO WAIT UNTIL A REMEDY BECOMES AVAILABLE. SINCE THEN, IT HAS BEEN A SIGNIFICANT INCONVENIENCE TO AVOID HAVING PASSENGERS RIDE IN THE FRONT PASSENGER SEAT.
